body:
I'm having troubles here getting our other linting infra to accept the changes that were needed to make this run in mozilla-central.

@Osmose suggested not having repo wide linting, and making it per app. I think this is a good idea, and would make this situation potentially easier. I'm going to close this PR with the goal of doing that linting change and then re-applying this change.
